meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2085.

td.p: Lauri Haggard, a medical laboratory aide from Oxnard, California
Barry Kerman, an ophthalmologist from Woodland Hills, California
Pam McCully, a consultant from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,201)

tr.td: AMERICAN HISTORY
DIRECTORS ON FILM
COLORS
MEDICINE
BREAKFAST FOOD
QUOTATIONS

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Pam: What are frogs?)

locusts (grasshoppers)

PamBarry
')
